mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment_history (equipment_no, member_id, equipment_begindate, equipment_enddate) VALUES(#{equipmentNo}, #{memberId}, #{equipmentBegindate}, #{equipmentEnddate})
mapper.update: UPDATE equipment SET equipment_status = #{equipmentStatus} WHERE equipment_no = #{equipmentNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM equipment_history eh INNER JOIN equipment e ON eh.equipment_no = e.equipment_no WHERE eh.member_id = #{memberId}
AND e.equipment_name LIKE '%' #{equipmentName} '%'
